channel.title: Wiki
channel.description:
I wanted to create a wiki thats free and basically I control what content is posted on the wiki... I.E if someone wants to add "Hi" it'll ask me to confirm to add this, and I can accept nor deny... Or a wiki that will just let me post and only people I give permission too.
IS this possible?
Thanks :D

item.title: Wiki
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Just for the heads up, ‘General Questions’.

Yes it’s possible. It’s an option/setting on page creator.

Edit: Ruby beat me to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Wiki
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

I woulden’t know how… and I thought I did, sorry my mistake :s

Read full topic

item.title: Wiki
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Should be in general questions and yes it’s possible, don’t know if there’s any softwares widely available for it so far but you could always create your own or modify an open source one.

Read full topic
